summary: This is an email from Assistant United States Attorney Maurene Comey to defense counsel regarding discovery production in the case US v. Maxwell. It informs counsel that physical discovery (a drive and CD) is available for pickup and that a laptop has been delivered to Ghislaine Maxwell at the MDC for her to review the discovery materials.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Author of the email, responsible for coordinating the discovery production and delivery of a laptop to Ghislaine Maxwell at the MDC.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the case US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN), who is incarcerated at the MDC and will use a provided laptop to review discovery materials.

connections.description: Comey, as an AUSA, is part of the prosecution team handling the case against defendant Maxwell, coordinating the delivery of discovery materials to her.

events.title: Discovery Production and Laptop Delivery
events.description: AUSA Maurene Comey informs defense counsel that a new discovery production is available for pickup and that a laptop has been hand-delivered to Ghislaine Maxwell at the MDC for her to review discovery drives.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A new discovery production in US v. Maxwell was made available for pickup at One St. Andrew's Plaza on November 18, 2020.
A laptop was hand-delivered to Ghislaine Maxwell at the MDC to allow her to review discovery drives, though it lacks sufficient storage to save the productions locally.
The prosecution's IT and paralegal staff confirmed the laptop can open all file types in the discovery productions to date.
